replies.body: The inventory just doesn't look ok.
replies.body_tagged: The inventory just doesn't look ok.

replies.body: Ima be honest, amazing Pot PvP pack, but I would never use this for SG. And btw, why Arabic. The language is funny tho, but I recommend you redo it because its kinda racist =l. Overall the pack is good, but the clear inv is a little...uh...off. It dosent feel good. I recommend you use my packs clear inv, not to advertise or anything, but I really think it feels amazing.
replies.body_tagged: Ima be honest, amazing Pot PvP pack, but I would never use this for SG. And btw, why Arabic. The language is funny tho, but I recommend you redo it because its kinda racist =l. Overall the pack is good, but the clear inv is a little...uh...off. It dosent feel good. I recommend you use my packs clear inv, not to advertise or anything, but I really think it feels amazing.

replies.body:
Me and my friends were messing around making packs, and the name came up, I don't mean it to be racist, its just for fun, but if it does offend anyone, I am willing to change it.

As for the inventory.. Idk whats up with that, its fine for me...

replies.body: Ah ok. For the inv there isnt anything wrong with it, but it just looks a little off, like it dosent feel right. I used to use a inv like that and I hated it, and I changed to my usual. It just isnt good. It is good if your making a faithful edit, but default edits simply dont go together.
